resources.string: Delete selected webservice entry? This will also try to unregister this device on the webservice.
Only change the address if you are sure that the server will still recognize your device under the new address
Couldn\'t unregister from webservice, deleting anyway

We are sorry, but we can\'t continue executing CrySIL on Android: Your system does not support the Android KeyStore. This is absolutely necessary to run CrySIL on Android. See the details of the error message:
We are sorry, but we can\'t continue executing CrySIL on Android: Your system does not have the Google Play Services installed. This is absolutely necessary to run CrySIL on Android.
We are sorry, but we can\'t continue executing CrySIL on Android: Your system does not have an NFC adapter present. This is absolutely necessary to run CrySIL on Android.
